long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover new and interesting communities on Reddit with a single click! My extension adds a button to your browser that opens a random subreddit every time you click it. Looking for something new and interesting to browse on Reddit? Click the button to open a random subreddit and discover hidden gems on the internet. From memes to serious discussions, you never know what you'll find. Give it a try and see where the rabbit hole takes you!
